title: Sergei Yevin
text:
Sergei Aleksandrovich Yevin (; born 2 July 1977) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played two seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Lada%20Togliatti">FC Lada Togliatti</a> and <a href="FC%20Volga%20Ulyanovsk">FC Volga Ulyanovsk</a>.
